#Text=The Toronto Raptors ( 31 - 15 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 16 - 28 ) 119 - 102 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto .

#Text=While the game went into halftime tied 54 - 54 , the Raptors came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Kings 39 - 22 and allowing themselves to coast to a 17 - point victory at home in front of their crowd .

#Text=The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 48 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc .
#Text=With their fantastic shooting and rebounding advantage , the Raptors grabbed their fourth straight victory .

#Text=The biggest contributor for the Raptors surprisingly came off the bench in Wednesday 's matchup , as Louis Williams finished with a team - high of 27 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 4 - 12 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , while also adding two assists and three steals in only 26 minutes .
#Text=It was a very nice surprise for the Raptors , as he 's only averaging 15 points per game so far this season .
#Text=Greivis Vasquez shot well , going 7 - for - 9 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also recording four rebounds and six assists .
#Text=He 's really struggled with his shot this season , so it was good to see him turn it around Wednesday .
#Text=Coming just short of a double - double , Jonas Valanciunas recorded 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and nine rebounds .
#Text=He 's now averaging 13 points and 9 rebounds on the season .
#Text=Neither Kyle Lowry or DeMar DeRozan had too big of a night , but each still finished in double figures .
#Text=Lowry had 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and seven assists , while DeRozan had 12 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 4 FT ) and six assists .
#Text=The Kings were led by Rudy Gay , who recorded 22 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and three assists .
#Text=Despite Friday 's zero point outing where he played only 13 minutes , Gay has now scored 22 points or more in his last four games .
#Text=Ben McLemore went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding five rebounds .
#Text=It was the most points he 's scored since mid - December , so it was good to see him dial in his shot Wednesday .
#Text=Having one of his least productive games in awhile , DeMarcus Cousins finished with only 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and two blocked shots .
#Text=He matched a season - high of nine turnovers as well , so he 'll need to cut those down if the Kings want a chance at winning in the future .
#Text=The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while the Kings will travel to Cleveland to play the Cavaliers on Friday .
